activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11358
activity.text:
Subject: Fix: Duplicate User Data Resolution (PR #11472)

Issue: Duplicate user entries due to multiple API responses.

Root Cause: API returning redundant user data.

Solution: Implemented unique ID filter in PR #11472.

Details:

After investigating the reported duplicate user issue, I traced the source to the API providing multiple entries for the same user ID. To rectify this, I've added a filter within PR #11472 that ensures only unique user IDs are processed.

The attached screenshot demonstrates the filter's effectiveness in removing duplicate entries.

Request: Please review and merge PR #11472 to resolve this issue.



Link: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/11472
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3e6eaef1-ecaa-4258-b530-c9101ff12d68)

After applying the filter for unique IDs.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8853228c-4322-439c-acbe-654cc2bc0923)
